name: Zeus Needs Omelettes
description:
Zeus needs omelettes!

As the King of Egglandia, that puts you in an awkward spot - the only way to appease him is by sacrificing your own subjects!

Pick up your eggy subjects and toss them in the Holy Frying Pan, but watch out - other eggs won’t be happy if they see you carrying their kinfolk to their death.

Luckily, you can buy them off with coins from the royal treasury - for a time.

If either Zeus or your subjects get angry enough, it’s game over - how long can you last?

Controls Keyboard
  • Arrow keys: move
  • Z: jump (tap twice to double-jump)
  • X: pick up / throw egg
  • C: throw coin
Gamepad
  • Left stick: move
  • A: pick up / throw egg
  • B: jump (tap twice to double-jump)
  • X: throw coin
